duties_responsibilities.duty: Create technologies and tools for validating the performance and scalability of large-scale enterprise systems.
Benchmark & test the platform to meet the growing needs of largest customers.
Develop and apply tools / automation frameworks that measure the characteristics of complex systems under dynamic, real-world loads.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine marketing strategies.
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: BS/MS Degree in Computer Science with solid experience developing and deploying mission critical software.
